Text: You have to say that it is BDrip not a BR. BDrip is Blu-ray Disc rip.
Just curious lilmjkl is there really a difference between "BluRay Rip" and "BluRay Disc Rip"?
@nightprowler- BDRip = Directly from the Bluray Disc & BRRip = Rip of a high quality BDRip[1080p/8GB+(though there's no strict definition of HQ BDRip)]
